title: Best of The Herd: 08/17/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/17/2018
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin and talks about Sam Darnold deserving to be the Jets starter but how that's actually a bad thing. He thinks the Patriots gave the Eagles a big middle finger last night. Plus, former NFL RB Rashad Jennings comes in studio to disagree with Doug that all these pre-season injuries justify the NFL not having guaranteed contracts. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
